name: dat-docs
description: Documentation for Dat and the surrounding ecosystem.

scripts.update:token: npm run update:list && cat repos.txt | ecosystem-docs sync -t ${GH_TOKEN} && cat repos.txt | ecosystem-docs read -t ${GH_TOKEN} | node scripts/build.js
scripts.update: npm run update:list && npm run update:build
scripts.update:list: curl -Ssl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datproject/docs/master/README.md | grep 'ðŸ“”' | egrep -o 'github.com/[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+/[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+' | cut -f 2- -d / | uniq > repos.txt
scripts.update:build: cat repos.txt | ecosystem-docs sync && cat repos.txt | ecosystem-docs read | node scripts/build.js
scripts.build:local: npm run build:css && minidocs docs -c docs/contents.json -o dist  -l ./node_modules/dat-design/public/img/dat-hexagon.svg -t 'Dat Documentation' -s assets/styles.css --assets assets --pushstate
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build:css && minidocs docs -c docs/contents.json -o dist -l ./node_modules/dat-design/public/img/dat-hexagon.svg -t 'Dat Documentation' -s assets/styles.css --assets assets --full-html
scripts.netlify: npm run update:token && npm run build:deploy
scripts.paper: npm run latex && cd papers && pandoc --filter pandoc-citeproc --bibliography=dat-paper.bib --variable classoption=twocolumn --variable papersize=a4paper -s dat-paper.md -o dat-paper.pdf
scripts.latex: cd papers && pandoc --filter pandoc-citeproc --bibliography=dat-paper.bib --variable classoption=twocolumn --variable papersize=a4paper -s dat-paper.md -t latex -o dat-paper.txt
